name: Splamoji
description:
Be a slime and defeat the grumpy looking emoji

Control:

AWSD to move

Spacebar to jump

Mouse Left Click to attack

PS: I'm so sorry for the bug that you will found when you are playing.  I only have a day to work on the basic gameplay. So here you go!. This is for game jam  The Krass New Jam 1, Hosted by Krassenstein #krassian.
